node.contentSnippet: In the fifth episode of pitcHer, we have Shilpashree V, a mechanical undergraduate student, batch of 2023 who is currently doing internship as GET intern at Pidilite. Tune in to Shilpashree's talk to gain insights on how she got internship, internship preparation tips and her views on women recruitment programs in tech industry.
node.title: WIT Episode 5 - Shilpashree V

node.contentSnippet: In the fourth episode of pitcHer, we have Indhu Lekha Annam, an IT undergraduate student, batch of 2023 who is currently doing internship as SDE at Microsoft. Tune in to Indhu's talk to gain insights on how she got internship, internship preparation tips and her views on women recruitment programs in tech industry.
node.title: WIT Episode 4 - Indhu Lekha Annam

node.contentSnippet: In the Third episode of pitcHer we have Sahana Sedamkar, an IT undergraduate student, batch of 2023 who is currently doing internship as Technology analyst at Morgan Stanley. She is also the Chairperson of IET NITK. Tune in to sahana's talk to gain insights on how she got internship, internship preparation tips and her views on women recruitment programs in tech industry.
node.title: WIT Episode 3 - Sahana Sedamkar

node.contentSnippet: In the second episode of pichtHer we have Nikitha K M an IT student, batch of 2021 who is currently a SDE at Amazon, Luxembourg. She is also the former SIG head of Cipher IET NITK. Listen to Nikitha talk about her tech journey and how she secured internships, full time offers from companies like Microsoft, Amazon, Siemens and Oracle, and her view on Women in Tech and reservations for girls.
node.title: WIT Episode 2 - Nikitha K M

node.contentSnippet: In the first episode of pitcHER we have Abha Wadjikar, a CSE student, batch of 2021 who is currently a SDE at Apple. She is also the former SIG head of Inkheart and Medium, IET NITK. She interned at Apple as an iOS developer and was a mentor for GSoC 2020. Listen to Abha talk about her college life, life experiences, way of preparation for interviews and recruitments, and her opinion on women in STEM. Tune in to get some great college life and career insights and how women in tech is an important aspect today!
node.title: WIT Episode 1 - Abha Wadjikar
